intents.name: ask_javascript_info
examples: Can you give me the link to javascript.info?

intents.name: ask_mozilla_developer_docs
examples: What's the Mozilla Developer Network JavaScript guide?
Tell me about MDN's JavaScript documentation
Can you give me the link to MDN's JavaScript guide?
I need the MDN JavaScript documentation

utter_ask_javascript_info.text: Here's the link to javascript.info: https://javascript.info/

utter_ask_mozilla_developer_docs.text: Here's the link to the Mozilla Developer Network JavaScript Guide: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Guide

stories.story: user asks for MDN JavaScript guide

rules.rule: direct request for MDN JavaScript guide
